lines.text: [MUSIC]
Last time on Gun City, the Temple of The Penguin of Doom.
Three brilliant archaeologists, Patrick Yoder, Lotos Piss and Ray William Johnson,
were hired out of prison by a one Leo the Collector, one of the richest people in Gun City,
who is an avid collector of rare artifacts from Planet E-Bomb's ancient past.
He brought our heroes via his Sky Galleon to his island in the sky, New England,
to ask them to help him find the long-fabled N-Word Pass of the lost Tomogachi Empire,
located in the undiscovered Temple of Tepegwin of Doom.
To do so, they will need to need a key into discovering its location,
which Leo has arranged the obtainment of by a holding an auction on his island.
That's a cool sentence.
Auction on his island in which one of the items is up for grabs.
Where one of the items up for grabs, the floppy disk, is in his own little deep hangar
and is said to contain clues as to where to find the temple.
Sullivan the Frog, assistant to Leo, will be representing the collector at the auction
and the gang will have to protect him from many dangerous folks who also desire the item.
Whether they are Gerard Depoupou, rival collector to Leo, or Pennsylvania Jim, rival adventurer to the gang.
After fucking a couch for the second time, spending a day stealing techno slime percocets from a
hospital in New England, and stealing the time of a sales rep at a Brookstone at Leo's shopping mall,
our heroes made their way to the events center, where they met the aforementioned troublesome
duo of Depupu and Pennsylvania Jim, along with Blowtoss' and Ray's ex-lover Marie Stane
and her bodyguard Rex.
After getting right plastered and all that, the fellas settled down for the auction, but
not before taking note of a strange figure in a hood sitting quietly among the crowd.
About halfway through the auction, Patrick Yoda, with his super hearing, heard what he
thought was Jafar sneaking around the center.
He and Blowtoss Piss went out to investigate while Ray William Johnson held down the fort
to the auction house.
Blotoss sent Patrick the Monkey up the air vents where he confirmed the worst.
There were party crashes about.
Blotoss strategically used- strategically- oh no wait, here it is.
Blotoss- I know all that!
Blotoss helped the strategically tiny Patrick Yoda up through the vent to learn more, and
Patrick Yoda assessed where in the ventilation system the intruders had gone.
Earlier, Blotoss had managed to sneak a set of Volkswagen Jetta keys into the auction room,
Buying Patrick Yoda just enough time to use Yoda's mind,
reading the thoughts of the intruders with such incredible clarity that he breached the language barrier
to understand with certainty the intent of these foreign invaders,
to steal the floppy disk that lays under the penguin.
Thinking fast, Patrick Yoda
busted down the gate, the grate of the vent,
whipped out his hoverboard, and brutalized these intruders,
beginning a brawl in the auction house.
